entries.arrival_phase_1: Keep your eyes open, pilot. Our intelligence agents have determined that their base commander will make a break for it!
entries.arrival_phase_2: There he is pilot! You have your mission now execute on it!
entries.assassinate_success: Commander Chaen has been defeated! Good, pilot! Soon, the Car'das will rule Ord Mantell space and bring peace.
entries.destroy_escort: Commander Chaen has been defeated, but we still need to target his escorts as well! Continue as planned, pilot.
entries.escort_remaining: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer:pcontrast3 <%DI escort targets remaining.>
entries.escort_wiped_out: Dartas Pytin: <Commander Chaen is getting away! Destroy him immediately!>
entries.failed_escape: Pilot, our mission has failed! Commander Chaen was able to get away and request more assistance. We're through!
entries.quest_escort_d: 'Not only do I have to destroy Commander Chaen, but also the vessels guarding him. They won't let me get away so easily after assassinating their leader.'
entries.quest_location_d: 'The modern era of the Black Sun syndicate is led by Prince Xizor, the head of the Xizor Transport Systems. "Vigos", a term meaning 'nephew', serve under him, watching over specific territories and activities.'
entries.quest_target_d: 'One of the base commanders of the Dual Moons, according to the Car'das intelligence agents, plans to make a break for it. He'll be heading for the Darkveil Eclipse, the main hub of the Trinity. I can't let that happen or our mission to destroy the Black Sun will be over.'
entries.split_quest_alert: Dartas Pytin: <The first of the Dual Moons is down. Now, let's concentrate on the other. You know what to do.>
entries.title: The Trinity: Lieutenant Commander Chaen
entries.title_d: 'Commander Chaen is on the run! I have to destroy him before he reaches the Darkveil Eclipse or our efforts against the Black Sun will be lost.'
